title: ILoftedBendsFeatureData.IGetProfiles
description: Gets the profiles for this lofted bends feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array profiles of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
ILoftedBendsFeatureData::GetProfileCount
before calling this method to get the size for Count.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
